name: GunsAndCans
description:
Guns and cans prototype. Pick up the gun, hand granade, or rifle to shoot the cans and get score.

This was my second project for Justin P Bernet's VR course.  This took longer than a week due to that I realize that the poly synth props and demo scene looks awesome, but is not optimized for running on a Quest 2. Alot of tweeks was needed to get it to run smoother and still it might be a little bit laggy when tried out.
